title: Understanding the Shortcut Menu
text: To change the format of a data point, you need to access the shortcut menu. Do you know how to open it?

title: Accessing the Format Option
text: Once you have the shortcut menu open, look for an option that allows you to format the data point. Can you find it?

hintAnswer: click the data point twice, then $$right-click$$ to display the shortcut menu, click 'Format Data Point'
title: Steps to Change the Format
text: First, click the data point twice to select it. Then, right-click to display the shortcut menu. Finally, click 'Format Data Point'.
choices: click the data point twice, then $$right-click$$ to display the shortcut menu, click 'Format Data Point'
click the data point once, then click 'Format Data Point'
